name: howler.js
about: Audio library for the modern web.howler.js makes working with audio in JavaScript easy and reliable across all platforms.

name: reveal.js
about: reveal.js is an open source HTML presentation framework. It's a tool that enables anyone with a web browser to create fully-featured and beautiful presentations for free.

name: Video.js
about: Video.js is a web video player built from the ground up for an HTML5 world

name: particles.js
about: A lightweight JavaScript library for creating particles

name: highlight.js
about: A lib to hightlight codes in html(Color, Indentation)

name: Mathjax
about: A JavaScript display engine for mathematics that works in all browsers. No more setup for readers. It just works.

name: Hover.css
about: A collection of CSS3 powered hover effects to be applied to links, buttons, logos, SVG, featured images and so on

name: Chart.js
about: Simple yet flexible JavaScript charting for designers & developers
